Question
========

When H~0~ at a significance level of Î± = 0.05 can be rejected is

Answerlist
----------

* Probability 0.05 that H0 is TRUE
* The probability 0.95 that Ha is TRUE
* The P-value less than or equal to 0.05

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The probability 0.05 that H0 is TRUE: Incorrect
* The probability 0.95 that Ha is TRUE: Incorrect
* The P-value less than or equal to 0.05: Correct
